name: Babilonia Hostel

reviews.text: Yup, this is a modern house that looks straight out of the Brady Brunch. And, don't you worry, the staff are just as friendly as that crazy family.
reviews.title: Live in the Brady Bunch house

reviews.text: This is a hostel that feels a bit more like a home -- a really clean home with comfortable beds and living spaces. Bathrooms are also spotless with plenty of hot water. (Yes, if the hostel is full, you may have to wait some minutes in the morning to use the bathroom, but there is one on each floor of the house.)
reviews.title: Really great hostel

reviews.text: Dinners are really good at night -- although I missed the asado due to meat-purchasing difficulties, I really enjoyed the pizza a la parilla. Delicious and good value.
reviews.title: Nice, clean, friendly and helpful

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Location is about 15 minute walk from the bus station (might want to pay an $18 ARG taxi if carrying a lot as it is an uphill walk). Quiet street, but just minutes from lovely parks. Visit the haunting museum in the main square commemorating the disappeared during Argentina's dictatorship.
reviews.title: Cheap and clean

reviews.text: This was a superb hostel - and I had a superb stay. Babilonia came highly recommended by friends who stayed here for a month, so I knew it had to be good. It was young, hip, impeccably clean, and I really liked the layout of the building. The staff was very friendly, almost too friendly!, and they had lots of insight for me as I planned my time in Cordoba. I would definitely return!
reviews.title: AMAZING HOSTAL!

description: Babilona Hostel is the starting point to get to know Córdoba.Babilonia Hostel has everything for the travellers to enjoy the city, arts and the night in Córdoba.It is located half block away from the main Boulevard and 5 minutes away from the main touristic centres. In this neighbourhood you can find a wide variety of fun bars, discos, restaurants and a hectic nightlifeArt exhibitions, music, books and films are some of the activities that you will enjoy at the hostel.Babilonia combines a strategic location and excellent prices for you to enjoy your tirp without wasting your money.FacilitiesWe want to offer the best and we have what it takes to do so. We have a great team.
